docs.text: Mkdocs Installation $ pip install mkdocs $ mkdocs new my-project $ cd my-project $ mkdocs serve Theming our documentation site_name: MkLorum site_url: https://example.com/ nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md theme: readthedocs Building the site $ mkdocs build Deploying your docs my-project/ mkdocs.yml docs/ orgname.github.io/ $ cd ../orgname.github.io/ $ mkdocs gh-deploy --config-file ../my-project/mkdocs.yml --remote-branch master Material theme # Installing theme only $ pip install mkdocs-material # Next, install the theme and its dependencies with: $ pip install -e mkdocs-material Reference mkdocs official site mkdocs material theme
docs.title: Home

docs.text: $ pip install mkdocs $ mkdocs new my-project $ cd my-project $ mkdocs serve
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: site_name: MkLorum site_url: https://example.com/ nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md theme: readthedocs
docs.title: Theming our documentation

docs.text: my-project/ mkdocs.yml docs/ orgname.github.io/ $ cd ../orgname.github.io/ $ mkdocs gh-deploy --config-file ../my-project/mkdocs.yml --remote-branch master
docs.title: Deploying your docs

docs.text: # Installing theme only $ pip install mkdocs-material # Next, install the theme and its dependencies with: $ pip install -e mkdocs-material
docs.title: Material theme

docs.text: mkdocs official site mkdocs material theme
docs.title: Reference

docs.text: Advanced Mkdocs Configure Pages and Navigation // A minimal navigation configuration could look like this: nav: - 'index.md' - 'about.md' // override the title in the nav setting add a title right before the filename nav: - Home: 'index.md' - About: 'about.md' // Navigation sub-sections can be created by listing related pages together under a section title nav: - Home: 'index.md' - 'User Guide': - 'Writing your docs': 'writing-your-docs.md' - 'Styling your docs': 'styling-your-docs.md' - About: - 'License': 'license.md' - 'Release Notes': 'release-notes.md' mkdocs navigation configuration
docs.title: Advanced

docs.title: Configure Pages and Navigation
